steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"23hp5","text":"Once the 50 to 60% of colonies come off the plate, bring plate into the hood and neutralize the reaction by adding   of E8+Ri media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6BAD3350FA3311ED82030A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7kh5b","text":"Count the colonies in in each well, ideal colony number is between 10-30. It doesn’t have to be perfect number. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elaqg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fri17","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ejkpe","text":"Note: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dpvlo","text":"Each clump should have 20-40 cells.
